scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run func-test
scripts.func-test: npm run deps && npm run clean && npm run build && mocha test/func
scripts.build: cd examples/bemhtml && YENV=development enb make && cd ../bemhtml-old && YENV=development enb make && cd ../bemtree && YENV=development enb make && cd ../bemtree-old && YENV=development enb make
scripts.clean: cd examples/bemhtml && enb make clean && cd ../bemhtml-old && enb make clean && cd ../bemtree && enb make clean && cd ../bemtree-old && enb make clean
